subject: NEW FILE uploaded to "Jim's RR-DR60 EVP's"
author: James W. Hyslope
full_text: Sorry Guys, I ment to click the "notify group when I uploaded the file 2) Extra-Modified_call_us_in _the_morning-evp-goldwave.mp3 This is the best I can do (maybe)to bring out the audio (little girls voice) Through Audacity it has been slowed down, pitch changed, amplified...then lastly I ran it through Goldwave to remove background noise. It has the familiar "flute-organ" type musical cadence to it....But I believe the voice is more noticable here for others that couldn't here the Original or Audacity enhanced versions. I really don't like going this far to enhance. Crossing my fingers :) Please post if anyone can hear it now. Blows me away.....LOL
